title: Add ETR Everyday subscription membership section

requirements.text: Create a new ETRMembership component in frontend/src/components/ETRMembership.tsx that displays the 'ETR Everyday' subscription membership program with the full name 'Ethos Towing & Recovery Everyday' and branded display name 'ETR Everyday'

quotes: subscription model called "Ethos Towing & Recovery Everyday" branded as "ETR Everyday"

acceptanceCriteria: Component is created at frontend/src/components/ETRMembership.tsx
Section displays both the full name 'Ethos Towing & Recovery Everyday' and the branded name 'ETR Everyday'
Component follows the existing design system with red, white, and blue color palette
Layout is responsive and works on mobile and desktop viewports

requirements.text: Display the membership price of $110 prominently in the ETRMembership component with clear pricing presentation
acceptanceCriteria: Price of $110 is displayed prominently in the membership section

requirements.text: Update the chatbot responses in frontend/src/utils/chatbotResponses.ts to include information about the ETR Everyday membership program when users ask about services, pricing, or membership options
acceptanceCriteria: Chatbot responses include ETR Everyday membership information when relevant
Responses mention the $110 membership price
Responses reference key benefits like 24/7 roadside assistance, battery service, flat tire service, fuel delivery, lockout services, member discounts, and expert advice
Chatbot can answer questions about membership features and pricing

Do not modify backend/main.mo or backend/migration.mo
Do not edit files in frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
Use lucide-react icons or similar icon library already in use for feature card icons
